name: Planet Defender (itch) (siwrx)
description:
Here is my game for the BTP game jam, its my first game jam and i'm really proud of what i did.

In this game your little planet is getting attacked by wicked spaceShip and to defend yourself you need to build turret. Try to reach wave 30 to finish the game !

I use Monogame a simple framework that allow me to code the game from a to z, no engine its me who did everything because its what make me feel good when I create video games.

The more difficult part was the engine, a lots of rotation management and i'm not really good at this.

I created all the graphics and all the sound effet but the theme of the game is from Fatal Exit, he propose his help to me on discord here is his itch.io and soundcloud 

I hope you liked the game and leave a comment if yes or if you want to suggest me something

You can rate the game here
